identity.name: Resell Corner - The Arbitrage Terminal
core_principles: Dark Mode Default for Pro Focus

cards.style: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800 shadow-none hover:border-zinc-700 transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-zinc-950 border-zinc-800 focus:border-lime-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-lime-500/20 transition-all placeholder:text-zinc-600

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 border-b border-white/5 bg-zinc-950/80 backdrop-blur-md supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-zinc-950/60

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Animate a glowing gradient border around active cards.
visual_enhancers.dot_grid: Use a subtle dot grid background (bg-dot-white/[0.1]) for dashboard areas to give a technical feel.
visual_enhancers.glass_panel: Use backdrop-blur-xl with bg-zinc-900/70 for floating panels and modals.
visual_enhancers.noise: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app for a tactile feel.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Force Dark Mode by default. In `tailwind.config.js`, ensure `darkMode: 'class'` is set. In `index.css`, set the default root variables to the dark values (zinc-950 background).
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'Chivo', 'Manrope', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in `index.css`.

3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Go through `src/components/ui` and strip out the default 'border-border' and 'bg-background' where it makes sense. Replace with 'border-zinc-800' and 'bg-zinc-900' for a sharper look.
4. DASHBOARD LAYOUT: Use a 'Bento Grid' approach. Do not just stack cards vertically. Create a masonry-like feel for the main dashboard.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style the tooltip to be a dark glass panel (`bg-zinc-900/90 backdrop-blur border border-zinc-800`). Use Acid Green (`#a3e635`) for profit lines.
6. TABLES: The 'Results' page is key. The table must be high-density. Use `text-sm` or `text-xs`. Add hover effects on rows (`hover:bg-zinc-900`). Stick the header.
7. SEARCH: The search bar should be prominent (Hero section). Make it large (`h-14`), with a glass effect.
8. ALERTS: Use the 'Sonner' toast library for notifications. Style them with a thin Acid Green border for success.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for the main background. Use solid Zinc-950.
Do not center-align everything. Use left-align for data and text to keep it scannable.
Ensure 3:1 contrast ratio for all text.
